snippet: The Pennsylvania House approved legislation on Wednesday that would authorize a tax on the natural gas industry in exchange for limiting municipal control over where companies could drill.
abstract: Pennsylvania House narrowly approves legislation that will authorize a tax on the natural gas industry in exchange for limiting the control that municipalities will have over where companies could drill; Gov Tom Corbett has said he will sign the bill.
lead_paragraph: The Pennsylvania House approved legislation on Wednesday that would authorize a tax on the natural gas industry in exchange for limiting municipal control over where companies could drill.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Tax on Gas Industry Is Approved
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Tax On Gas Industry Is Approved
